# prismarine-biome

Represent a minecraft biome with its associated data

## Usage

```js
var Biome=require("prismarine-biome")("1.8");

var ocean=new Biome(0);

console.log(ocean);
```

## API

### Biome

#### biome.id

Numerical id.

#### biome.color

#### biome.height

#### biome.name

#### biome.rainfall

#### biome.temperature

## History

### 0.1.0

* Import from mineflayer
